Conjoint levels and features

| Features/Attributes | Levels                             |
|---------------------|------------------------------------|
| Price               | \$2, \$3, \$4                      |
| Packaging           | Plastic + paper, Plastic + sticker |
| Flavor              | Nuts, Chocolate                    |
